attributes.action: Discourage large supermarkets from forcing the poultry industry to cruelly farm chickens in inhumane conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall recently produced a Channel 4 documentary entitled 'Hugh's Chicken Run'.  The pressure mounted by large supermarkets on the poultry industry to mass farm chickens in inhumane conditions for profit is appalling.  Please sign this petition to allow pressure to be mounted against the ability of large supermarket chains to promote this barbaric treatment of chickens for naked profiteering.
